item.title: CVE-2023-47818|2024-06-04T10:08:41.550Z -- LWS -- LWS Hide Login
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in LWS LWS Hide Login allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects LWS Hide Login: from n/a through 2.1.8.
